title: Éclairs
description: Get to grips with choux pastry to make the ultimate teatime treat: delicious chocolate éclairs.Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag fitted with the small, plain nozzle.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz plain flour or strong white flour
400ml/14fl oz whipped cream, whipped volume (about 200ml/7fl oz unwhipped double cream)
